lines.text: What did I tell you I'd do if I ever caught you stealing again?
You said you'd rip my balls off, sir.
Say it again!
You said you'd rip my balls off, sir.
Say it again!
You said you'd rip my balls off, sir.

[pickup line]
Tickle your ass with a feather?
I beg your pardon?
It's particularly nasty weather.

[grabbing the bunk below Chooch]
You don't wet your bed, do you?

[sarcastically]
No, I generally just piss over the side.
Those glasses that you're wearing make you stand out like a turd in a punch bowl!
Somebody put a turd in the punchbowl!

[to Leisman]
Help yourself sir.
Hello Colonel. I was just...
I know what you were doing.
You do?
Did you like what you saw MacArthur?
Uh no. I mean yes. I mean.
It's okay MacArthur. Meet me in my room in 5 minutes.
Yes ma'am.
Ms. Bliss? Miss Bliss?
Hey! What are you doing here?
Uh, nothing. Just taking a walk.
Well, take it outside. Now! Let's go. Get out of that room!
Shit, this is the wrong room.
Great. This is the right room.
You again! What did I tell you?
Shit, not again.
That's right. Maybe 50 push-ups will help you remember.
Oh MacArthur! Oh!
Colonel. I'd love to stay and get together but I gotta get outta here.
Is it something I said? Did I come on too strong?
No. I just have to go and meet the guys.
Don't you want to meet these guys?
I would. But my friends are counting on me.
Okay. Meet me in my room later. I'll be waiting.
Miss Bliss?
Did anyone see you MacArthur?
No Colonel.
Good. Now, where were we?
Here, I think.
Oh, yeah. Mmmmm, oh MacArthur.
Oh Colonel.
Sit on the bed MacArthur.
Yes ma'am.
Make yourself comfortable. So, these are what you wanted to see, right?
Yes ma'am.
You're lucky MacArthur. I never go all the way with a cadet.
Really?
Yeah, but you're different.
I am?
Yeah. You know, all these guys care about is my body.
I know. Wow!
So what do you think MacArthur? I do have a nice set, don't I?
Yes you do.
Slide over here. Come on and have a feel, MacArthur. Touch them.
Uh.
Don't be shy. That's what they're there for.
Uh.
That's it. I know you want them!
Ike. Are you in here? Shit!
What does Leisman want more than anything else?
My balls!
My soul!
My ass!
Just call me Ike.
Hash.
Not now, man. Maybe after dinner.
No. My *name* is Hash. It's easier to say than "El Hashid Amir Junior".
It's easier to smoke too.

[ignoring introductions]
I'm taking this top bunk. Anybody got any objections?
Sorry, I didn't catch your name.
I didn't "throw" it.
Do you like it when a gentleman ties you up?
What?
You know... with rope.
Tickle your ass with a feather?
Maybe later.

[to the Landmines]
Do you fellas have an album on sale somewhere?
[to himself]
I'd buy their album.
